flawed_nl_solution:
If he had 200 fish and sells 50, he is left with 200 - 50 = <<200-50=150>>150 fish
If a third of them get spoiled 1/3 * 150 = <<150*1/3=450>>450 fish get spoiled
The remaining number of fish is now 150 - 450 = <<150-450=-300>>-300
He then gets 200 more to make -300 + 200 = <<-300+200=-100>>-100 fish

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 450. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
